P

Pawn - Class in gameElement
This class represents a pawn.

The constructor of the class which initializes the attributes.

This method allows to know who owns a pawn.
pawnToMove() - Method in class gameElement.AutoPlayer
This method allows to choose randomly a pawn to move among the pawn of the player.

This method only ask the pawn that the player want to move.
pawnToMove() - Method in class gameElement.Player
This method only ask the pawn that the player want to move.
